name: Vial of Liquid Thought
ability: Sacrifice Vial of Liquid Thought: Return an Attack Card from your Attack Discard pile to your hand. If you do, place one Attack Card from your hand on the bottom of your Attack Deck.

name: Blazier's Map Collection
ability: If equipped Creature moved this turn, at the beginning of combat reveal a new active Location.
flavorText: If Blazier would only stop mapping new lands and look over his collection, he would discover that he has already found what he's been searching for his entire life.

name: Bronzeflight
ability:
Equipped Creature has an additional 20 Speed. 
While an opposing Creature has Range, equipped Creature has "Defender."
This Battlegear begins the game face-up.
flavorText: A marvel of engineering, the Bronzeflight can travel from Mipedim Oasis to Mount Pillar on a single charge.

name: Burithean Axe
ability:
Stat Check Power 50: Equipped Creature has an additional 5 Energy.
Stat Check Power 75: Equipped Creature has "Intimidate: Energy 10.
flavorText: What takes 20 to wield, Rothar swings with one arm!

name: Dread Tread
ability: If equipped Creature moved this turn and won combat, it may move again. This move may begin a second combat.
flavorText: The Dread Tread can rip through Kiru City's "impenetrable" walls as if they were made of paper.

name: Evergreen Tunic
ability:
Stat Check Courage 50: Equipped Creature has an additional 5 Energy.
Stat Check Courage 75: Equipped Creature has an additional 15 Energy.

name: Flitflut
ability:

name: Girgeth Tar

name: Hornsabre
ability: Opposing Creatures on your side of the Battleboard have "Recklessness 5.

name: Ikkatosh's Aichstick
ability:
Stat Check Wisdom 50: Equipped Creature has an additional 5 Energy.
Stat Check Wisdom 75: The first attack played by equipped Creature has "Untargetable.
flavorText: To aid in the war, Ikkatosh proved he would give part of himself... literally!

name: Levitaar
ability:
Equipped Creature has an additional 50 Speed.
When equipped Creature is dealt attack damage, deal 5 damage to the opposing engaged Creature.
flavorText: Raznus's favorite transport before his unfortunate transformation.

name: Mipedian Balladeers' Flute
ability:
Sacrifice Mipedian Balladeers' Flute: Equipped Creature gains a Mugic counter. Your opponent may put a Mugic counter on a Creature of their choice.
This Battlegear begins the game face-up.
flavorText: Melodies, harmonies, cacophonies: Mugicians love all music without prejudice.

name: Obliterators
ability:
Equipped Creature has Fire. 
Sacrifice Obliterators: Deal 5 damage to target Creature. Play this ability only if you control Dread Tread.
flavorText: It's the perfect war machine: the Obliterators annihilate anything the Dread Tread fails to steamroll.

name: Ozlai's Wreck
ability: Sacrifice Ozlai's Wreck: Destroy target Battlegear equipped to an engaged Creature.
flavorText: Though Ozlai named "The Wreck" after what it can do to other vehicles, many believe that it's named after his state of mind.

name: Residual Lightning Dust
ability:
Stat Check Speed 50: Equipped Creature has an additional 5 Energy.
Stat Check Speed 75: When equipped Creature takes 20 or more damage from a single source, deal 5 damage to the opposing engaged Creature.

name: Sahrnokk
ability: Sacrifice Sahrnokk: Creatures may not end their move in equipped Creature's space.
flavorText: As Ørth whizzed by Gespedan to win the race and their wager, Gespedan regretted agreeing to give Ørth naming rights to his next child.

name: Scepter of the Infernal Parasite
ability: While engaged with an Infected Creature, equipped Creature has "Outperform all Disciplines 5.
flavorText: The parasites proved once again that determination trumps size every time.

name: Van Bloot's Sickle
ability:
Equipped Creature has an additional 15 Courage. 
Attacks played by equipped Creature have "The opposing engaged Creature loses 10 Courage.
flavorText: Seeing its sharpness, even the most courageous lose heart... just before they lose their heads.

name: Warriors of Owayki
ability:
Mipedians you control have "{{MC}}: Deal 10 damage to target engaged Creature." 
Flip Warriors of Owayki face-down at the end of combat.

name: Weightless Energy Vessel
ability:
Equipped Creature may not be the target of Mugic Cards. 
This Battlegear begins the game face-up.
flavorText: Even the most unimaginative Mipedians thought the name was too "on-the-nose.

name: Wing-Fin
ability:
Equipped Creature has an additional 15 Courage and 15 Power. 
Sacrifice Wing‐Fin: Relocate equipped Creature into an unoccupied space. Play this ability only while equipped Creature is unengaged.

name: Aichlyys Wisp
ability: Equipped Creature has an additional 40 Wisdom and 5 Energy.
flavorText: As ephemeral as dreams and just as cherished.

name: Armbands of Lore
ability: Equipped Creature has an additional 40 Courage and 5 Energy.
flavorText:
Total control and domination!? You are fools! Control is an illusion... and that is why you will fail." 
—Lore

name: Bodal's Dagger
ability: Equipped Creature deals an additional 10 damage with non-Elemental, non-Discipline Attacks.

name: Crown of Aa'une
ability: Equipped Creature has Creature Type "Chieftain" in addition to its other types. (Minions use Brainwashed text. Minions may only play Generic Mugic.)
flavorText: For true leaders, the crown does not define the king. The king defines the crown.

name: General's Standard
ability: When General's Standard is revealed, choose a Tribe. Equipped Creature is considered to belong to that Tribe while General's Standard is face-up. (This effect does not end at the end of the turn.)

name: Gigantroper
ability: At the beginning of combat, equipped Creature loses all abilities and gains or loses Courage, Power, Wisdom, Speed and Energy to make those values 70.

name: Indigo Sash
ability: Equipped Creature has an additional 40 Speed and 5 Energy.
flavorText:
I never expected to see an UnderWorlder wearing the emblem of our noble Mipedian ancestors. And I've never been happier." 
—Tiaane

name: Khybon's Mech-blade
ability: Equipped Creature has an additional 40 Power and 5 Energy.
flavorText: The handle hides a trigger that instantly doubles the length of the blade. Naturally, Khybon has not told anyone about this feature.

name: Mipedian Fulgurite
ability: Equipped Creature has "Air 10." At the end of any combat, destroy Mipedian Fulgurite.
flavorText: The air crackled and sizzled, as did the enemy.

name: Muge's Tuningfork
ability:
Equipped Creature may play Mugic from any Tribe you control.
This Battlegear begins the game face-up.
flavorText: Though Mugicians may appear to love one tribe's music over another, the fact remains they they love all music equally.

name: Riverland Moon
ability: When equipped Creature deals Water damage, it gains 10 to all Disciplines.

name: Shard of Solitude
ability:
Equipped Creature has an additional 5 Energy.

flavorText:
Another one? The M'arrillians have more shards than Van Bloot has feathers!" 
—Takinom
